name: R5-ConditionVerificationStatus-R4-ConditionVerificationStatus
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 ConditionVerificationStatus into FHIR R4

target.display: There is sufficient diagnostic and/or clinical evidence to treat this as a confirmed condition.
target.comment: R5 `confirmed` is assumed equivalent to R4 `confirmed` (no map, but codes match)

target.display: One of a set of potential (and typically mutually exclusive) diagnoses asserted to further guide the diagnostic process and preliminary treatment.
target.comment: R5 `differential` is assumed equivalent to R4 `differential` (no map, but codes match)

target.display: The statement was entered in error and is not valid.
target.comment: R5 `entered-in-error` is assumed equivalent to R4 `entered-in-error` (no map, but codes match)

target.display: This is a tentative diagnosis - still a candidate that is under consideration.
target.comment: R5 `provisional` is assumed equivalent to R4 `provisional` (no map, but codes match)

target.display: This condition has been ruled out by diagnostic and clinical evidence.
target.comment: R5 `refuted` is assumed equivalent to R4 `refuted` (no map, but codes match)

target.display: There is not sufficient diagnostic and/or clinical evidence to treat this as a confirmed condition.
target.comment: R5 `unconfirmed` is assumed equivalent to R4 `unconfirmed` (no map, but codes match)
